tool_description: An api of generated RPG items
name: RPG Items
title: RPG Items

api_list.name: Get Item by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rpg-items.p.rapidapi.com/item/6383989636a233ea35d1e566"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rpg-items.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rpg-items.p.rapidapi.com/item/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rpg-items.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
